title: Connecting Devices
fullText:
Where electrical equipment is connected to the installation wiring by a connection in the form of a plug and socket-outlet, appliance plug, or similar connecting device, any connection of exposed conductive parts to earth shall be: 
(a) made automatically, before the live connections are made, when any plug portion is inserted in the corresponding socket-outlet; and 
(b) broken automatically, not before the live connections are broken, when any plug portion is withdrawn from the corresponding socket-outlet.
